name: Lamont Doherty Earth Observatory
tagline: DgS manufactured and provided an Advanced Technology Airborne gravity system, used in LDEO's Antarctic Ice Surveys

name: Natural Environment Research Council (UK)
tagline: DgS recently manufactured and delivered an Advanced Technology Marine gravity system (upgraded) to the UK's Natural Environment Research Council

name: National Geodetic Survey
tagline: DgS has partnered with the NGS to perform airborne surveys and data processing

name: British Antarctic Survey
tagline: DgS is currently manufacturing an AT1 Marine gravity system for BAS's new research vessel the RSS Sir David Attenborough
